job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pThe Software Engineer will work closely with a multidisciplinary team of designers product managers and engineers to design and build products that our PGA Coaches and consumers love The Software Engineer will use Test Driven or Behavior Driven Development to build mobile and web products to address customer needs that are reliable valuable usable and feasibleppbrppstrongRESPONSIBILITIES Specific areas of responsibility include but are not limited tostrongppbrpulliDesign develop test deploy maintain and improve softwareliliManage individual project priorities deadlines and deliverablesliliHelp build a worldclass team and cultivate innovationliliLead designs of major software components systems and featuresnbspliliParticipate in design time with other engineers to explore different component design tradeoffs and test decisionsliliMentor and train other team members on new technologies design techniques and coding standardsliliActively seek out customer and market insights that lead to highvalue digital productsliulpbrppbrppstrongEDUCATION AND EXPERIENCEstrongppbrppBachelors Degree BS in Computer Programming Computer Science or related fieldnbspppTwo years of experience working with two or more of the following web application development databases mobile application developmentnbspandor developing large software systemsnbspSoftware development experience in one or more generalpurpose programming languages including but not limited to Dart Python JavaScript Go Swift Intermediate design problem solving and troubleshooting skills Must have Ruby on Rails experienceppbrppbrppstrongSKILLS KNOWLEDGE AND ABILITIESnbspstrongppbrppKnowledge of web application database management systems knowledge of a variety of webauthoring toolsnbspAbility to maintain the confidentiality of sensitive data and the ability to logically structure processes and proceduresnbspMust have skills in the operation of computers in word processing and spreadsheet software applications graphic design tools such as Photoshop and Adobe IllustratornbspKnowledge of Google WorkspaceppbrppbrppbrppemThis position is not eligible for immigration sponsorshipemppbrppReasonable accommodations may be made to enable qualified individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions of this positionppbrppbrppThe PGA of America is an equal opportunity employer All candidates for employment will be considered without regard to race color religion sex national origin physical or mental disability veteran status or any other basis protected by applicable federal state or local law DFWPp
